mapper.insert: INSERT INTO forj_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_gender, user_phone, user_email) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, user_name as userName, user_email as userEmail FROM forj_user WHERE user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
